member.name: M:Novitec.Mupet.Hana.DBAccessHana.substracParametersInQuery(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.String@)
member.summary: Busca todas las coincidencias de parametros en formato @\w+ y crea un subconjunto de los parametros solicitados. La razon por la cual se usa una lista de pares y no un diccionario es debido a que en HanaCommand no se pueden usar @param en el query, en su lugar solo '?'. Por tanto un parámetro repetido debe aparecer varias veces en en el orden correcto, a diferencia del SQLCommand
member.param: Se modifica el query cambiando cada parametro por '?'

member.name: P:Novitec.Mupet.Properties.LogAttemptResources.HANA_Attach_LogAttemptObject_Log
member.summary: Busca una cadena traducida similar a INSERT INTO "{MupetDB}"."LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT_LOG_WS" ("LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT_ID" ,"LOG_WS_ID" ,"STATUS") VALUES (@attempt_id ,@log_id ,@status) .

member.name: P:Novitec.Mupet.Properties.LogAttemptResources.HANA_AutocompleteAttemptType
member.summary: Busca una cadena traducida similar a SELECT DISTINCT "OBJ_TYPE" AS name FROM "{MupetDB}"."LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT" WHERE CONTAINS("OBJ_TYPE", @query).

member.name: P:Novitec.Mupet.Properties.LogAttemptResources.HANA_Exist_LogAttemptObject
member.summary: Busca una cadena traducida similar a SELECT IFNULL(MAX("ID"),0) as ID FROM "{MupetDB}"."LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT" WHERE "OBJ_ID"=@obj_id AND "OBJ_TYPE" = @obj_type AND "DIRECTION" = @direction AND "ACTION" = @action .

member.name: P:Novitec.Mupet.Properties.LogAttemptResources.HANA_Insert_LogAttemptObject
member.summary: Busca una cadena traducida similar a INSERT INTO "{MupetDB}"."LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT" ("CREATED" ,"TRIED" ,"DIRECTION" ,"ACTION" ,"OBJ_TYPE" ,"OBJ_ID" ,"LATEST_LOG" ,"STATUS" ,"SAP_HOOK" ,"THIRDPARTY_HOOK" ,"NVT_CODE" ,"NVT_MESSAGE" ,"SAP_CODE" ,"SAP_MESSAGE") VALUES (CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS DATETIME) ,CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS DATETIME) [resto de la cadena truncado]";.

member.name: P:Novitec.Mupet.Properties.LogAttemptResources.HANA_NOTIN_LogAttemptObject
member.summary: Busca una cadena traducida similar a CAST({fieldName} AS VARCHAR(100)) NOT IN(SELECT "OBJ_ID" FROM "{MupetDB}"."LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT" WHERE "OBJ_TYPE" = '{objType}' AND "DIRECTION" = '{direction}' AND "ACTION" = '{action}' AND "STATUS" IN ('N', 'E', 'PE') AND CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS DATETIME) <= ADD_SECONDS ("TRIED", {afterHours}*60*60) ) .

member.name: P:Novitec.Mupet.Properties.LogAttemptResources.HANA_Remove_LogAttemptObject
member.summary: Busca una cadena traducida similar a DELETE FROM "{MupetDB}"."LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT" WHERE "OBJ_ID"=@obj_id AND "OBJ_TYPE" = @obj_type.

member.name: P:Novitec.Mupet.Properties.LogAttemptResources.HANA_RemoveOld_LogAttemptObject
member.summary: Busca una cadena traducida similar a DELETE FROM "{MupetDB}"."LOG_WS" WHERE ""OBJ_TYPE" = @obj_type AND ADD_SECONDS ("TRIED", @after_hours*60*60) ) < CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS DATETIME).

member.name: P:Novitec.Mupet.Properties.LogAttemptResources.HANA_SELECT_LogAttemptObjectByLogId
member.summary: Busca una cadena traducida similar a SELECT A."ID" FROM "{MupetDB}"."LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT" A INNER JOIN "{MupetDB}"."LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT_LOG_WS" B ON A."ID" = B."LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT_ID" WHERE B."LOG_WS_ID" = @latest_log AND A."DIRECTION" = @direction ANd A."ACTION" = @action AND A."OBJ_TYPE" = @obj_type .

member.name: P:Novitec.Mupet.Properties.LogAttemptResources.HANA_Select_LOGTPATTEMPTS
member.summary: Busca una cadena traducida similar a SELECT {select} FROM "{MupetDB}"."LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT" t0 WHERE {where} {orderby}.

member.name: P:Novitec.Mupet.Properties.LogAttemptResources.HANA_SelectOne_LOG_ATTEMPT
member.summary: Busca una cadena traducida similar a SELECT * FROM "{MupetDB}"."LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT" WHERE ID = @id.

member.name: P:Novitec.Mupet.Properties.LogAttemptResources.HANA_Update_LogAttemptObject
member.summary: Busca una cadena traducida similar a UPDATE "{MupetDB}"."LOG_ATTEMPT_OBJECT" SET "DIRECTION" = @direction ,"ACTION" = @action ,"SAP_HOOK" = @sap_hook ,"THIRDPARTY_HOOK" = @thirdparty_hook ,"LATEST_LOG" = @latest_log ,"STATUS" = @status ,"NVT_CODE" = @nvt_code ,"NVT_MESSAGE" = @nvt_message ,"SAP_CODE" = @sap_code ,"SAP_MESSAGE" = @sap_message ,"TRIED" = CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS DATETIME) WHERE "ID"=@id .

member.name: P:Novitec.Mupet.Properties.LogAttemptResources.HANA_Update_LogAttemptObject_Log
